# probounds.calculate_bounds_observed_by_feature { #probounds.probounds.calculate_bounds_observed_by_feature }

```python
probounds.calculate_bounds_observed_by_feature(df_observed, feature)
```

Calculate observational bounds for each category of ``feature``.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name        | Type      | Description                                                      | Default    |
|-------------|-----------|------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| df_observed | FrameLike | Observational dataset containing the ``feature`` column.         | _required_ |
| feature     | str       | Column on which to partition the data prior to computing bounds. | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type                                 | Description                                                  |
|--------|--------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | dict\[Hashable, dict\[str, float\]\] | Mapping from each feature value to its observational bounds. |
